tasks.test: deno task rescript:build && deno test --allow-read --allow-write tests/**/*.res.js
tasks.test:e2e: deno task rescript:build && deno test --allow-all tests/e2e/**/*.res.js
tasks.test:verify: deno task rescript:build && deno test --allow-read tests/verify/**/*.res.js
tasks.test:all: deno task test && deno task test:e2e && deno task test:verify
tasks.lsp: deno task rescript:build && deno run --allow-all noteg-lang/src/lsp/Server.res.js
tasks.compile: deno task rescript:build && deno run --allow-read --allow-write noteg-lang/src/Compiler.res.js
tasks.a11y:validate: deno task rescript:build && deno run --allow-read a11y/Validate.res.js
tasks.policy:check: echo 'Checking language policy...' && ! find . -name '*.ts' -not -path './node_modules/*' | grep -q . && ! test -f Makefile && echo 'Policy check passed.'
